name: Sudokuban
description:
(Made for KenneyJam 2017, by Anders "Finn" Wagner, Simon Weber and with help from AnthonyVS)

You're stranded on an island with random blocks with numbers and conviniently placed designated areas for said blocks. Your goal is to get away.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

(Hold) Spacebar: Drag blocks

R: Restart Level
